content.rendered:
All circulars, Co-Curricular inscriptions, excursion permissions, school payments, homework, report cards and communication with CGB staff are carried out via our communication network, Phidias.  In keeping with our policy on sustainable development, it is our aim to reduce the use of paper as much as possible.  Please make an effort to check Phidias on a daily basis.  It is essential that all CGB community members have access to this network and understand how to use it.

We now have a policy regarding the use of Phidias (Phidias Agreement) that can be found in the Parent Handbook. Should you have any questions or difficulties, please speak to our Academic Secretary.

Please access Phidias here.
